verses.text: \w As|strong="G2532"\w* \w soon|strong="G2117"\w* \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* daylight, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests, \w after|strong="G3326"\w* holding \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w consultation|strong="G4824"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law – \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G2532"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w High|strong="G2532"\w* \w Council|strong="G4892"\w* – \w put|strong="G4160"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w chains|strong="G1210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w away|strong="G3326"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*.

‘\w Are|strong="G1510"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*?’ \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*. \wj ‘\+w It|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w true|strong="G3588"\+w*,’\wj* \w replied|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests \w brought|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* number \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w charges|strong="G2723"\w* \w against|strong="G2723"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w So|strong="G1161"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w questioned|strong="G1905"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G3004"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*. ‘\w Have|strong="G3588"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w reply|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w make|strong="G2723"\w*?’ \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w*. ‘Listen, \w how|strong="G4214"\w* \w many|strong="G4214"\w* \w charges|strong="G2723"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* bringing \w against|strong="G3762"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.’

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* still \w made|strong="G1161"\w* \w no|strong="G3762"\w* reply whatever; \w at|strong="G2296"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w astonished|strong="G2296"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w*, \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w feast|strong="G1859"\w*, Pilate used \w to|strong="G2596"\w* grant \w the|strong="G1161"\w* people \w the|strong="G1161"\w* release \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w any|strong="G3739"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w prisoner|strong="G1198"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* might ask \w for|strong="G1161"\w*.

\w A|strong="G1722"\w* \w man|strong="G4160"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* Barabbas \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* prison, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* rioters \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w committed|strong="G4160"\w* \w murder|strong="G5408"\w* \w during|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w riot|strong="G4714"\w*.

\w So|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w* \w went|strong="G2532"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* began \w to|strong="G2532"\w* ask Pilate \w to|strong="G2532"\w* follow \w his|strong="G4160"\w* usual custom,

\w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w answered|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Do|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w want|strong="G2309"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* release \w the|strong="G1161"\w* “\w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*” \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*?’

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w aware|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w out|strong="G1063"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* jealousy \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* chief priests \w had|strong="G3588"\w* \w given|strong="G3860"\w* Jesus \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.
\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* chief priests incited \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* get Barabbas released \w instead|strong="G3123"\w*.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w however|strong="G1161"\w*, \w spoke|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w with|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w call|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* “\w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*”?’
\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w shouted|strong="G2896"\w*, ‘\w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*!’

‘\w Why|strong="G5101"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w harm|strong="G2556"\w* \w has|strong="G5101"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w*?’ \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w kept|strong="G4160"\w* \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1161"\w* \w shouted|strong="G2896"\w* \w furiously|strong="G4057"\w*, ‘\w Crucify|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*!’

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w wishing|strong="G1014"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w satisfy|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w crowd|strong="G3793"\w*, released Barabbas \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w after|strong="G1161"\w* scourging \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w gave|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w soldiers|strong="G4757"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w* away \w into|strong="G2080"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* courtyard – \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Government house – \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G4779"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* garrison \w together|strong="G4779"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w dressed|strong="G1737"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4209"\w* \w robe|strong="G4209"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w having|strong="G2532"\w* \w twisted|strong="G4120"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* thorns, \w put|strong="G4060"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*,

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* began \w to|strong="G2532"\w* salute \w him|strong="G3588"\w*. ‘Long life \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w*, \w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*!’ \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w kept|strong="G5087"\w* striking \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w head|strong="G2776"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w rod|strong="G2563"\w*, \w spitting|strong="G1716"\w* \w at|strong="G3588"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bowing|strong="G4352"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* ground \w before|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* – \w going|strong="G2532"\w* \w down|strong="G5087"\w* \w on|strong="G3588"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w knees|strong="G1119"\w*;

\w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* left \w off|strong="G1562"\w* \w mocking|strong="G1702"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G2532"\w* \w off|strong="G1562"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w purple|strong="G4209"\w* \w robe|strong="G2440"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G1746"\w* \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w on|strong="G1746"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* led \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* crucify \w him|strong="G3588"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* compelled \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w passer-by|strong="G3855"\w*, \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2956"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G2443"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w way|strong="G5100"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G2064"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* country, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* Alexander \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Rufus|strong="G4504"\w*, \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w go|strong="G2064"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* carry \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* known \w as|strong="G2532"\w* \w Golgotha|strong="G1115"\w* – \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w name|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* “\w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w Skull|strong="G2898"\w*.”

\w There|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* offered \w him|strong="G1325"\w* drugged \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* \w refused|strong="G3756"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w divided|strong="G1266"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w clothes|strong="G2440"\w* \w among|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, casting \w lots|strong="G2819"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w to|strong="G2532"\w* settle \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w each|strong="G5101"\w* \w should|strong="G3588"\w* \w take|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w It|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w nine|strong="G5154"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* morning \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* charge against \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w written|strong="G3588"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w over|strong="G1924"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* head, \w read|strong="G1924"\w* – “\w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w KING|strong="G3588"\w* \w OF|strong="G2532"\w* \w THE|strong="G2532"\w* \w JEWS|strong="G2453"\w*.”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w robbers|strong="G3027"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G1520"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w left|strong="G2176"\w*.
\f + \fr 15.28 \ft Some later manuscripts add: And the scripture was fulfilled that says, “He was counted among outlaws.”\f*

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* passers-by \w railed|strong="G3899"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w shaking|strong="G2795"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w*, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘\w Ah|strong="G3758"\w*! \w You|strong="G1722"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w destroy|strong="G2647"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w build|strong="G3618"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*,

\w come|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w and|strong="G2597"\w* \w save|strong="G4982"\w* \w yourself|strong="G4572"\w*!’

\w In|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G3668"\w* \w way|strong="G3668"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w chief|strong="G2532"\w* priests, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* teachers \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* Law, \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* mockery,

‘\w He|strong="G2532"\w* saved \w others|strong="G3588"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* cannot save \w himself|strong="G4862"\w*! \w Let|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* “\w king|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*,” \w come|strong="G2597"\w* \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w from|strong="G2597"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* can \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*.’ \w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w been|strong="G2532"\w* \w crucified|strong="G4957"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2532"\w* insulted \w him|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w At|strong="G1909"\w* midday, \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w over|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w country|strong="G1093"\w*, lasting \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w three|strong="G1766"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* afternoon.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w three|strong="G1766"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w called|strong="G3739"\w* \w out|strong="G2532"\w* \w loudly|strong="G3173"\w*, \wj ‘\+w Eloi|strong="G1682"\+w*, \+w Eloi|strong="G1682"\+w*, \+w lama|strong="G2982"\+w* sabacthani?’\wj* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w means|strong="G1510"\w* \wj “\+w My|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w my|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w you|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w forsaken|strong="G1459"\+w* \+w me|strong="G1473"\+w*?”\wj*

\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* \w round|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, ‘Listen! \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w calling|strong="G5455"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w*!’

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w ran|strong="G5143"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, soaking \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w sponge|strong="G4699"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* common \w wine|strong="G3690"\w*, \w put|strong="G4060"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* end \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w rod|strong="G2563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* offered \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w him|strong="G3708"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4222"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w*, ‘Wait \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1161"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w Elijah|strong="G2243"\w* \w is|strong="G5100"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w take|strong="G2507"\w* \w him|strong="G3708"\w* \w down|strong="G2507"\w*.’

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, giving \w a|strong="G1161"\w* \w loud|strong="G3173"\w* \w cry|strong="G5456"\w*, \w breathed|strong="G1606"\w* \w his|strong="G3588"\w* \w last|strong="G1606"\w*.
